## Install RStudio Server Pro

```{bash}
cd tmp
sudo apt-get install gdebi-core
sudo wget https://download2.rstudio.org/rstudio-server-pro-1.1.414-amd64.deb
sudo gdebi rstudio-server-pro-1.1.414-amd64.deb
```

## Install RStudio Connect

```{bash}
cd tmp
sudo apt-get install gdebi-core
sudo wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/rstudio-connect/ubuntu-12.04/x86_64/rstudio-connect_1.5.12-7_amd64.deb
sudo gdebi rstudio-connect_1.5.12-7_amd64.deb
```

## Install RStudio Pro Drivers

```{bash}
cd tmp
sudo wget https://drivers.rstudio.org/7C152C12/odbc-install.sh
sudo chmod +x odbc-install.sh
sudo ./odbc-install.sh
```
